contentrichtext.text: {{For|the Hong Kong director Xú Kè (徐克)|Tsui Hark}} {{Orphan|date=February 2009}} {{unsourced|date=January 2009}} '''Xu Ke''' ({{zh|c=徐珂|p=Xú Kē}}; 1869-1928) was a Chinese author. He wrote an "unofficial" history of the [[Qing Dynasty]], ''[[Qing bai lei chao]]'', published in 1917. {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Xu, Ke | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Qing Dynasty historian | DATE OF BIRTH = 1869 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = 1928 | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Xu, Ke}} [[Category:1869 births]] [[Category:1928 deaths]] [[Category:Qing Dynasty historians]] [[Category:Republic of China historians]] [[Category:Writers from Hangzhou]] {{China-writer-stub}}
